data.text: @WalesOnline Maybe now they won’t sit with their engines idling in ranks making a right old stink for anybody passing
@WalesOnline You’d swear with the headline,that it’s only taxi drivers suffering with fuel prices! #mediascum

@WalesOnline URGENT
Government trying to change Human Rights law for the worse. 

👇
Take action by (tomorrow) 8th March 2022!

@WalesOnline Errrr. Everyone is being pummeled by fuel prices.
